LanguageData.WhoreSleepingSpot.label: whore sleeping spot
LanguageData.WhoreSleepingSpot.description: Designates a spot on the ground where people whore.
LanguageData.BedWhore.label: whore bed
LanguageData.BedWhore.description: A bed specially designed for whores.
LanguageData.DoubleBedWhore.label: double whore bed
LanguageData.DoubleBedWhore.description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people, specially designed for whores.
LanguageData.RoyalBedWhore.label: royal whore bed
LanguageData.RoyalBedWhore.description: A luxurious gold-inlaid bed fit for the highborn whores. Very comfy and beautiful. Fits two.
